MAIA at AIDA TechDays Workshop

On 17 September 2025, Simone Bendazzoli presented MAIA at the AIDA TechDays Workshop, hosted by the AIDA community, Swedenâ€™s leading arena for medical AI research. This workshop showcased MAIAâ€™s capabilities in facilitating collaborative, reproducible, and scalable AI development in healthcare.

Workshop Highlights

  • End-to-End Model Development: Demonstrated the workflow from DICOM data ingestion to model deployment using nnU-Net within the MAIA platform.

  • Active Learning Integration: Showcased how MONAI Label and 3D Slicer can be utilized for active learning cycles, enhancing model performance with minimal labeled data.

  • Federated Learning Implementation: Explained the setup of NVFlare within MAIA for federated learning, enabling collaborative model training across institutions without sharing sensitive data.

All workshop materials, including slides, Jupyter notebooks, and setup guides, are available on the MAIA-AIDA TechDays Workshop page
